item.title: Getting started with jquery-mobile
item.description: Setup # The current version of JQuery Mobile is 1.4.5 and can be downloaded here: https://jquerymobile.com/ Download the zip file and extract all files. Create a library (or lib) folder inside of your application (inside the www folder). Create a jquery-mobile folder inside the lib folder (I’ve named mine jqm). Place all of the jquery-mobile files that you have extracted inside of the jquery-mobile folder. You can now link to these files in your index.
